verses.verse: I will bless <WH1288> Yahweh <WH3068> at all times. <WH6256> His praise <WH8416> will always be in my mouth. <WH6310>
My soul <WH5315> shall boast <WH1984> in Yahweh. <WH3068> The humble <WH6035> shall hear <WH8085> of it, <WH8055> and be glad.
Oh magnify <WH1431> Yahweh <WH3068> with me. <WH7311> Let us exalt his name <WH8034> together. <WH3162>
I sought <WH1875> Yahweh, <WH3068> and he answered <WH6030> me, <WH5337> and delivered me from all my fears. <WH4035>
They looked <WH5027> to him, <WH5102> and were radiant. Their faces <WH6440> shall never be covered with shame. <WH2659>
This poor man <WH6041> cried, <WH7121> and Yahweh <WH3068> heard <WH8085> him, <WH3467> and saved him out of all his troubles. <WH6869>
The angel <WH4397> of Yahweh <WH3068> encamps <WH2583> around <WH5439> those who fear <WH3373> him, <WH2502> and delivers them.
Oh taste <WH2938> and see <WH7200> that Yahweh <WH3068> is good. <WH2896> Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH1397> who takes refuge in him. <WH2620>
Oh fear <WH3372> Yahweh, <WH3068> you his saints, <WH6918> for there is no lack <WH4270> with those who fear him. <WH3373>
The young lions <WH3715> do lack, <WH7326> and suffer hunger, <WH7456> but those who seek <WH1875> Yahweh <WH3068> shall not lack <WH2637> any good thing. <WH2896>
Come, <WH3212> you children, <WH1121> listen <WH8085> to me. <WH3925> I will teach you the fear <WH3374> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
Who is someone <WH376> who desires <WH2655> life, <WH2416> and loves <WH157> many days, <WH3117> that he may see <WH7200> good? <WH2896>
Keep <WH5341> your tongue <WH3956> from evil, <WH7451> and your lips <WH8193> from speaking <WH1696> lies. <WH4820>
Depart <WH5493> from evil, <WH7451> and do <WH6213> good. <WH2896> seek <WH1245> peace, <WH7965> and pursue it. <WH7291>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s eyes <WH5869> are toward the righteous. <WH6662> His ears <WH241> listen to their cry. <WH7775>
Yahweh <WH3068>'s face <WH6440> is against those who do <WH6213> evil, <WH7451> to cut off <WH3772> their memory <WH2143> from the earth. <WH776>
The righteous cry, <WH6817> and Yahweh <WH3068> hears, <WH8085> and delivers <WH5337> them out of all their troubles. <WH6869>
Yahweh <WH3068> is near <WH7138> to those who have a broken <WH7665> heart, <WH3820> and saves <WH3467> those who have a crushed <WH1793> spirit. <WH7307>
Many <WH7227> are the afflictions <WH7451> of the righteous, <WH6662> but Yahweh <WH3068> delivers him out of them all. <WH5337>
He protects <WH8104> all of his bones. <WH6106> Not one <WH259> of them <WH2007> is broken. <WH7665>
Evil <WH7451> shall kill <WH4191> the wicked. <WH7563> Those who hate <WH8130> the righteous <WH6662> shall be condemned. <WH816>
Yahweh <WH3068> redeems <WH6299> the soul <WH5315> of his servants. <WH5650> None of those who take refuge <WH2620> in him shall be condemned. <WH816>
